posts.post_title: Danny and Dode - Fourth Browns with Two to Go - SOLD
posts.post_content:
A twosome from St. Louis is this year's Fourth of July special.  I am offering this pair for $69 shipped (Don West's jaw just dropped).  Available today so you don't have to wait.
